Title: Specifies the settings in which an ultrasound or similar medical imaging device procedure may be offered
Summary: Specifies the settings in which an ultrasound or similar medical imaging device procedure may be offered; provides penalties for violations.

ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to specifying the settings in which an ultrasound or similar medical imaging device procedure may be offered
